findSql.name: granite.findONTEquipmentDetailsByPathInstId
findSql.label: Find ONT Equipment Details By PathInstId

method.name: cwOnFinderSQLSel
method.script: select ei.equip_inst_id, ei.descr, ei.type, ei.vendor, ei.model, ei.serial_no, ei.status, ei.installed, ei.in_service, ei.decommission, (select eas.attr_value from equip_attr_settings eas, val_attr_name van where eas.equip_inst_id = ei.equip_inst_id and eas.val_attr_inst_id = van.val_attr_inst_id and van.attr_name = 'ONT ID' and van.group_name = 'ONT/Customer Details') ontId, (select eas.attr_value from equip_attr_settings eas, val_attr_name van where eas.equip_inst_id = ei.equip_inst_id and eas.val_attr_inst_id = van.val_attr_inst_id and van.attr_name = 'ONT Type' and van.group_name = 'ONT/Customer Details') ontType, p.port_hum_id, p.bandwidth from circ_path_element cpe, epa p, equip_inst ei where p.port_inst_id = cpe.port_inst_id and ei.equip_inst_id = p.equip_inst_id and ei.type = 'FTTH-ONT' {[0] and cpe.circ_path_inst_id = ?}
